text: Be able to modify URLs for images that are from URLs in DM2. Right now I can only add a brand new URL. I also can’t copy that URL for reuse.

*Idea:* Optional Publish/Save Comments.
Many of us are used to version control systems and since HubSpot stores different states of files it would be nice to be able to have these comments show in our revisions when editing a file. This will help people who are trying to integrate an actual version control system into their work flow identify where changes occured, it will also help developers not using those systems distinguish where certain changes occured.

Right now since the revisions system doesn’t Diff the files you can’t tell what changed without manually diffing. Having the comments will atleast help with that.

All credit for this idea goes to <@U26BLKGE4> <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C22PU4LV8/p1534804032000100?thread_ts=1534800965.000100&cid=C22PU4LV8>
